name: @prantlf/jsonlint
description: JSON validator - checks syntax of JSON files.
author: Ferdinand Prantl <prantlf@gmail.com> (http://prantl.tk)

scripts.prepare: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build: jison -o lib/jsonlint.js src/jsonlint.y src/jsonlint.l && node scripts/bundle.js | uglifyjs > web/jsonlint.js
scripts.benchmarks: jison -o benchmarks/jsonlint-pure.js benchmarks/jsonlint-pure.y benchmarks/jsonlint-pure.l && node benchmarks/parse.js
scripts.test: npm run test:module && npm run test:cli
scripts.test:cli: nyc --silent node lib/cli package.json test/recursive && nyc --silent --no-clean node lib/cli -s -V test/passes/3.schema.json test/passes/3.json && nyc --silent --no-clean node lib/cli -C test/passes/comments.txt && nyc --silent --no-clean node lib/cli -v && nyc --silent --no-clean node lib/cli -h && nyc --silent --no-clean node lib/cli -pc test/fails/10.json || nyc report
scripts.deploy: cd ../jsonlint-pages && git commit -a -m 'Deploy site updates' && git push origin gh-pages
